702339f-a.title: Brooklyn: 4th Avenue - 40th Street
702339f-a.text:
4th Avenue, west side, from 4Oth to 41st Streets,
showing, in a set of two views, Public School No. 136.
View 1 is across 4lst Street; view 2, south across 40th Street.
July 4, 1930
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODDTTIONS
